00018 template<class Tsrc> int
00019 Histogram<Tsrc>::CalculateHistogram(FIBITMAP *src, double min, double max, int number_of_bins, unsigned long *hist)
00020 {
00021         if (hist == NULL)      
00022                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00023 
00024         // clear histogram array
00025         memset(hist, 0, number_of_bins * sizeof(unsigned long) );
00026 
00027         double range = max - min; 
00028         double range_per_bin = range / (number_of_bins - 1);     
00029 
00030         long total_pixels = FreeImage_GetWidth(src) * FreeImage_GetHeight(src);   
00031 
00032         Tsrc *bits = (Tsrc *) FreeImage_GetBits(src);
00033         Tsrc pixel;
00034         int bin;
00035 
00036         for(int x=0; x < total_pixels ; x++) {
00037         
00038                 pixel = (Tsrc) *bits;
00039                                 
00040                 if(pixel >= (Tsrc)min && pixel <= (Tsrc)max) {
00041         
00042                         bin = (int) floor( (pixel - min) / range_per_bin );
00043 
00044                         hist[bin]++;
00045                 }
00046 
00047                 bits++;
00048         }
00049 
00050         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 Histogram<unsigned char>                histogramUCharImage;
00055 Histogram<unsigned short>               histogramUShortImage;
00056 Histogram<short>                                histogramShortImage;
00057 Histogram<unsigned long>                histogramULongImage;
00058 Histogram<long>                                 histogramLongImage;
00059 Histogram<float>                                histogramFloatImage;
00060 Histogram<double>                               histogramDoubleImage;

00067 int DLL_CALLCONV
00068 FreeImageAlgorithms_Histogram(FIBITMAP *src, double min, double max, int number_of_bins, unsigned long *hist)
00069 {
00070         if(!src)
00071                 return NULL;
00072 
00073         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE src_type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src);
00074 
00075         switch(src_type) {
00076                 case FIT_BITMAP:        // standard image: 1-, 4-, 8-, 16-, 24-, 32-bit
00077                         if(FreeImage_GetBPP(src) == 8)
00078                                 return histogramUCharImage.CalculateHistogram(src, min, max, number_of_bins, hist);
00079 
00080                 case FIT_UINT16:        // array of unsigned short: unsigned 16-bit
00081                         return histogramUShortImage.CalculateHistogram(src, min, max, number_of_bins, hist);
00082 
00083                 case FIT_INT16:         // array of short: signed 16-bit
00084                         return histogramShortImage.CalculateHistogram(src, min, max, number_of_bins, hist);
00085 
00086                 case FIT_UINT32:        // array of unsigned long: unsigned 32-bit
00087                         return histogramULongImage.CalculateHistogram(src, min, max, number_of_bins, hist);
00088 
00089                 case FIT_INT32:         // array of long: signed 32-bit
00090                         return histogramLongImage.CalculateHistogram(src, min, max, number_of_bins, hist);
00091 
00092                 case FIT_FLOAT:         // array of float: 32-bit
00093                         return histogramFloatImage.CalculateHistogram(src, min, max, number_of_bins, hist);
00094 
00095                 case FIT_DOUBLE:        // array of double: 64-bit
00096                         return histogramDoubleImage.CalculateHistogram(src, min, max, number_of_bins, hist);
00097 
00098                 case FIT_COMPLEX:       // array of FICOMPLEX: 2 x 64-bit
00099                         break;
00100         }
00101 
00102         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00103 }

00106 int DLL_CALLCONV
00107 FreeImageAlgorithms_RGBHistogram(FIBITMAP *src, double min, double max, int number_of_bins,
00108                         unsigned long *rhist, unsigned long *ghist, unsigned long *bhist)
00109 {
00110         if (rhist == NULL || ghist == NULL || bhist == NULL)      
00111                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00112 
00113         // clear histogram arrays
00114         memset(rhist, 0, number_of_bins * sizeof(unsigned long) );
00115         memset(ghist, 0, number_of_bins * sizeof(unsigned long) );
00116         memset(bhist, 0, number_of_bins * sizeof(unsigned long) );
00117 
00118         double range = max - min; 
00119         double range_per_bin = range / (number_of_bins - 1);     
00120 
00121         int width = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00122         int height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00123 
00124         unsigned int *bits;
00125         unsigned char red_pixel, green_pixel, blue_pixel;
00126         int bin;
00127 
00128         for(int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00129 
00130                 bits = reinterpret_cast<unsigned int *>(FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y));
00131 
00132                 for(int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
00133 
00134                         red_pixel = *bits >> FI_RGBA_RED_SHIFT;
00135                         green_pixel = *bits >> FI_RGBA_GREEN_SHIFT;
00136                         blue_pixel = *bits >> FI_RGBA_BLUE_SHIFT;
00137 
00138                         if(red_pixel >= (unsigned int) min && red_pixel <= (unsigned int) max) {
00139         
00140                                 bin = (int) floor( (red_pixel - min) / range_per_bin );
00141                 
00142                                 rhist[bin]++;
00143                         }
00144 
00145                         if(green_pixel >= (unsigned int) min && green_pixel <= (unsigned int) max) {
00146         
00147                                 bin = (int) floor( (green_pixel - min) / range_per_bin );
00148                 
00149                                 ghist[bin]++;
00150                         }
00151 
00152                         if(blue_pixel >= (unsigned int) min && blue_pixel <= (unsigned int) max) {
00153         
00154                                 bin = (int) floor( (blue_pixel - min) / range_per_bin );
00155                 
00156                                 bhist[bin]++;
00157                         }
00158                 }
00159         }
00160 
00161         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00162 }

00164 
00165 FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV
00166 FreeImageAlgorithms_HistEq_Random_Additions(FIBITMAP *src)
00167 {
00168         FIBITMAP *dib;
00169         int i, R;
00170         const int number_grey_levels = 256;
00171         int type, bpp, image_width, image_height, *left, *width;
00172         unsigned char *src_bits, *dib_bits;
00173         long total, Hsum, Havg, *histogram;
00174 
00175         bpp = FreeImage_GetBPP(src);
00176         type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src);
00177         
00178         // The image is not 8bit greyscale return.
00179         if( bpp != 8 || type != FIT_BITMAP )
00180                 return NULL;
00181 
00182         image_width = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00183         image_height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00184 
00185         // Allocate a 8-bit dib
00186         dib = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_BITMAP, image_width, image_height, 8, 0, 0, 0);
00187         FreeImageAlgorithms_CopyPalette(src, dib);
00188 
00189         total = (long) image_width * image_height;
00190         
00191         left =  (int *) malloc (sizeof(int) * number_grey_levels);
00192         width = (int *) malloc (sizeof(int) * number_grey_levels);
00193         histogram = (long *) malloc (sizeof(long) * number_grey_levels);
00194         
00195         /* Clear histogram */ 
00196         memset(histogram, 0, number_grey_levels); 
00197 
00198         FreeImage_GetHistogram(src, (DWORD *)histogram, FICC_BLACK );  
00199 
00200         /* right end of interval */ 
00201         R    = 0;               
00202         
00203         /* cumulative value for interval */ 
00204         Hsum = 0;               
00205         
00206         /* interval value for uniform histogram */
00207         Havg = total / number_grey_levels;      
00208 
00209         /* evaluate remapping of all input gray levels;
00210          * Each input gray value maps to an interval of valid output values.
00211          * The endpoints of the intervals are left[] and left[]+width[].
00212          */
00213         for(i=0; i < number_grey_levels; i++) {
00214         
00215                 left[i] = R;                    /* left end of interval */
00216                 
00217                 Hsum += histogram[i];
00218                 
00219                 while( Hsum > Havg && R < (number_grey_levels - 1) ) { /* make interval wider   */
00220                 
00221                         Hsum -= Havg;           /* adjust Hsum          */
00222                         R++;                    /* update right end     */
00223                 }
00224                 
00225                 width[i] = R - left[i] + 1;     /* width of interval    */
00226         }
00227 
00228         src_bits = (unsigned char *) FreeImage_GetBits(src);   
00229         dib_bits = (unsigned char *) FreeImage_GetBits(dib); 
00230 
00231         /* visit all input pixels and remap intensities */
00232         for(i=0; i < total; i++) {
00233         
00234                 const unsigned char pixel = *src_bits++;
00235         
00236                 if( width[pixel] == 1) {
00237                 
00238                         *dib_bits++ = left[pixel];
00239                 }
00240                 else {
00241                 
00242                         /* pixel spills over into width[] possible values */
00243                         /* randomly pick from 0 to width[i] */
00244                         
00245                         /* 0 <= R < width */ 
00246                         R = ( (rand() & 0x7fff) * width[pixel] ) >> 15; 
00247                         
00248                         *dib_bits++ = left[ pixel ] + R;
00249                 }
00250         }
00251         
00252         free(histogram);
00253         
00254         return dib;
00255 }

00257 
00258 FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV
00259 FreeImageAlgorithms_HistEq(FIBITMAP *src)
00260 {
00261         FIBITMAP *dst;
00262         int i;
00263         const int number_grey_levels = 256;
00264         int type, bpp, image_width, image_height;
00265         unsigned char *src_bits, *dst_bits;
00266         long total, Hsum;
00267         DWORD *histogram;
00268         double Havg;
00269         long *mapping;
00270 
00271         bpp = FreeImage_GetBPP(src);
00272         type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src);
00273         
00274         // The image is not 8bit greyscale return.
00275         if( bpp != 8 || type != FIT_BITMAP )
00276                 return NULL;
00277 
00278         image_width = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00279         image_height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00280 
00281         // Allocate a 8-bit dib
00282         dst = FreeImage_AllocateT(FIT_BITMAP, image_width, image_height, 8, 0, 0, 0);
00283 
00284         FreeImageAlgorithms_SetGreyLevelPalette(dst);
00285 
00286         total = image_width * image_height;
00287         
00288         mapping =  (long *) malloc (sizeof(long) * number_grey_levels);
00289         histogram = (DWORD *) malloc (sizeof(long) * number_grey_levels);
00290         
00291         /* Clear histogram */ 
00292         memset(histogram, 0, number_grey_levels); 
00293         memset(mapping, 0, number_grey_levels); 
00294 
00295         FreeImage_GetHistogram(src, histogram, FICC_BLACK );  
00296         
00297         /* cumulative value for interval */ 
00298         Hsum = 0;               
00299         
00300         /* interval value for uniform histogram */
00301         Havg = (double) total / (number_grey_levels - 1);       
00302 
00303         for(i=0; i < number_grey_levels; i++) {   
00304         
00305                 Hsum += histogram[i];
00306                 
00307                 mapping[i] = Hsum;
00308         }
00309 
00310         src_bits = (unsigned char *) FreeImage_GetBits(src);   
00311         dst_bits = (unsigned char *) FreeImage_GetBits(dst); 
00312 
00313         /* visit all input pixels and remap intensities */
00314         for(i=0; i < total; i++) {
00315         
00316                 const unsigned char pixel = *src_bits++;
00317         
00318                 *dst_bits++ = (const unsigned char) (int) ((mapping[pixel] / Havg) + 0.5);
00319         }
00320         
00321         free(histogram);
00322         
00323         return dst;
00324 }

00327 double DLL_CALLCONV
00328 FreeImageAlgorithms_GetGreyLevelAverage(FIBITMAP *src)
00329 {
00330         int bpp = FreeImage_GetBPP(src);
00331         int width = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00332         int height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00333         long size = width * height;     
00334         
00335         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src); 
00336 
00337         switch(type)
00338         {
00339                 case FIT_BITMAP:
00340                 {
00341                         if(bpp == 8)
00342                         {
00343                                 unsigned char *bits = (unsigned char *) FreeImage_GetBits(src);
00344                                 return MeanAverage(bits, size);
00345                         }
00346                 }
00347 
00348                 case FIT_INT16:
00349                 {
00350                         short *bits = (short *) FreeImage_GetBits(src);
00351                         return MeanAverage(bits, size);
00352                 }
00353                 
00354                 case FIT_UINT16:
00355                 {
00356                         unsigned short *bits = (unsigned short *) FreeImage_GetBits(src);
00357                         return MeanAverage(bits, size);
00358                 }
00359 
00360                 case FIT_FLOAT:
00361                 {
00362                         float *bits = (float *) FreeImage_GetBits(src);
00363                         return MeanAverage(bits, size);
00364                 }
00365         }
00366 
00367         return 0.0;
00368 }

00371 int DLL_CALLCONV
00372 FreeImageAlgorithms_MonoImageFindWhiteFraction(FIBITMAP *src, double *white_area, double *black_area)
00373 {
00374         int bpp = FreeImage_GetBPP(src);
00375         int width = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00376         int height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00377         long size = width * height;     
00378         
00379         int whites = 0;
00380 
00381         FREE_IMAGE_TYPE type = FreeImage_GetImageType(src); 
00382 
00383         if(type != FIT_BITMAP || bpp > 8)
00384                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00385 
00386         unsigned char *src_bits = (unsigned char *) FreeImage_GetBits(src);   
00387 
00388         for(int i=0; i < size; i++) {
00389         
00390                 const unsigned char pixel = *src_bits++;
00391         
00392                 if(pixel >= 1)
00393                         whites++;
00394         }
00395 
00396         *white_area = (double) whites / size;
00397         *black_area = 1 - *white_area;
00398 
00399         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00400 }

00403 int DLL_CALLCONV
00404 FreeImageAlgorithms_MonoTrueFalsePositiveComparison(FIBITMAP *src, FIBITMAP *result,
00405                                                                                                         int *tp, int *tn, int *fp, int *fn)
00406 {
00407         *tp = 0; *tn = 0, *fp = 0, *fn = 0;
00408 
00409         if(!src || !result)
00410                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00411 
00412         if(FreeImage_GetBPP(src) != FreeImage_GetBPP(result))
00413                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00414 
00415         if(FreeImage_GetImageType(src) != FreeImage_GetImageType(result))
00416                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00417 
00418         int width = FreeImage_GetWidth(src);
00419         int height = FreeImage_GetHeight(src);
00420         int pitch = FreeImage_GetPitch(src);
00421 
00422         if(width != FreeImage_GetWidth(result))
00423                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00424 
00425         if(height != FreeImage_GetHeight(result))
00426                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00427 
00428         if(pitch != FreeImage_GetPitch(result))
00429                 return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR;
00430 
00431         BYTE src_tmp, result_tmp;
00432         BYTE *src_bits, *result_bits;
00433 
00434         for(int y = 0; y < height; y++) {
00435 
00436                 src_bits = reinterpret_cast<BYTE *>(FreeImage_GetScanLine(src, y));
00437                 result_bits = reinterpret_cast<BYTE *>(FreeImage_GetScanLine(result, y));
00438                         
00439                 for(int x = 0; x < width; x++) {
00440 
00441                         src_tmp = src_bits[x];
00442                         result_tmp = result_bits[x];
00443 
00444                         if(src_tmp > 1)
00445                                 src_tmp = 1;
00446 
00447                         if(result_tmp > 1)
00448                                 result_tmp = 1;
00449 
00450                         // Pixels are the same and 1 increase true positive count.
00451                         if(src_tmp == 1 && result_tmp == 1)
00452                                 (*tp)++;                
00453                 
00454                         // Pixels are the same and 0 increase true negative count.
00455                         if(src_tmp == 0 && result_tmp == 0)
00456                                 (*tn)++;                
00457 
00458                         // Pixel not in src but in result increase false positive.
00459                         if(src_tmp == 0 && result_tmp == 1) 
00460                                 (*fp)++;
00461 
00462                         // Pixel in src image not in result increase false negative.
00463                         if(src_tmp == 1 && result_tmp == 0) 
00464                                 (*fn)++;                
00465                 }
00466         }
00467 
00468         return FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS;
00469 }
